description.en: The Taoist god-killer brings the nine-day stone to life in the city, He can refine the alchemy, refine the tools, and understand the methods of battle, and sees how Lin Fan hangs all evil in the city, stepping to the top, overlooking the living beings step by step.
description.vi: Thần quân mang theo cửu thiên thần thạch, trùng sinh tại đô thị, biết luyện đan, có thể luyện khí, hiểu trận pháp, hãy nhìn lâm phàm tại đô thị làm như thế nào trừng trị kẻ ác, từng bước một phi thăng, quan sát chúng sinh.

description.en:
He is recognized as the strongest existence, standing at the top of the world.  
  
Wealth? Fame? Power? It was not worth mentioning in his eyes.  
  
The strongest apostles fled and startled the human continent for the reason: "Don’t get me wrong! Lao Zi came to look for his future wife!"  
  
Yes, it’s a story about the strongest single apostle ever looking for a wife.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

"After several visits from the Reaper, Dohyung's life is constantly under peril. Although Dohyung is saved by the goblin, and falls in love with him, he won't easily reveal his identity... What is the fate of these two heading towards two different moments in time?" 

---

[Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7767), [Lezhin US](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/two_moments)

description.en:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!
description.id: Sepulang sekolah, Nakayama Koutarou kembali ke sekolah untuk mengambil sesuatu yang lupa dia bawa, di dalam kelas dia bertemu Shimotsuki Shiho yang terlelap. Katanya, Shiho ini ditaksir sama Ryuuzaki Ryouma, pria populer membentuk harem di kelas, namun dia tampak selalu datar dan tak ada yang pernah melihatnya tersenyum. Karena suatu kejadian mereka berdua berpegangan tangan dan memulai “hubungan rahasia” antara heroin dan mob.
description.ja:
『例えばもし、この世界が＜物語＞だとするならば主人公は一体誰になるのだろう――。』

高校入学式当日、義妹・親友・幼馴染の3人の少女に『サヨナラ』を告げられた中山幸太郎は、一人孤独な高校生活をスタートさせる。自分は誰の人生においても取るに足らない存在、『モブ』であることを明確に認識した幸太郎だったが、ある日の放課後、幸太郎は誰もいない教室で眠りこける霜月しほに遭遇する。クラスでハーレムを形成中のモテ男・竜崎龍馬の大本命だが、いつも無表情でクールと噂の彼女。その彼女が幸太郎の手を握り、満面の笑顔でこう言った。「わたしとお友達になってくれる？」

『この物語の主人公は俺ではない。そう思っていた。あの日までは――。』
description.pl:
Tylko ty jesteś wyjątkowy.

Po lekcjach Koutarou Nakayama wraca do szkoły, by zabrać coś, czego zapomniał i znajduje Shiho Shimotsuki śpiącą w pustej klasie. Mówi się, że Shiho podkochuje się w Ryoumie Ryuuzakim, popularnym chłopaku, który założył harem w swojej klasie, ale ona zawsze jest bez wyrazu i nikt nigdy nie widział jej uśmiechu.

Ale teraz, trzyma rękę Koutarou...?! Rozpoczyna się „sekretny związek” między bohaterką a postacią poboczną!
description.pt-br: Depois da escola, Kotaro Nakayama retorna à escola para pegar algo que esqueceu e encontra Shiho Shimotsuki dormindo em uma sala de aula vazia. Há rumores de que Shiho é a paixão de Ryoma Ryuuzaki, um garoto popular que formou um harém em sua classe, mas ela é sempre inexpressiva e ninguém nunca a viu sorrindo. Mas agora, ela está segurando a mão de Kotaro…?! A “relação secreta” entre a heroína e o figurante começa!

altTitles.ja: クッキングパパ

description.en:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He’s also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox… It’s time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it.

His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.

---
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**

altTitles.en: I Just Want To Get Rid of You

description.en: The solo priest Mo Chuan accidentally summoned and created a pact with a beast that has been sealed for a few hundred years. Mo Chuan, who wants to seal back the beast, and the beast, who wants to get rid of Mo Chuan soon engages in a push and pull fight. But in the process, changes occur and feelings quietly starting to arise….

altTitles.ja: しのびごと

description.en: Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?
description.ja: 時は現代！世を忍び悪を討つ公安忍部隊のヨダカは、女子高生・向日アオイの護衛を命じられる。極端にコミュニケーションが苦手なヨダカは目立たず生徒となりアオイを護る予定が、何故か彼女と友達になり!?
description.pt-br: Mesmo no Japão moderno, os ninjas ainda se escondem nas sombras. O jovem ninja Yodaka recebeu sua missão: proteger a estudante do ensino médio Aoi a todo custo. Mas um ninja pode sobreviver ao mundo selvagem do ensino médio e ao mesmo tempo cumprir sua missão?

description.en: Captain Tsubasa: 2000 Millennium Dream is an 88-page oneshot released in commemoration of Japan's participation in the football tournament of Sydney 2000. The oneshot was originally published in Shueisha's seinen magazine Weekly Young Jump special issue #2000-10-20. The story was compiled, along with other short stories not related to the main series, in Captain Tsubasa Tanpenshu: Dream Field.

title.en: Captain Tsubasa: Rising Sun - The Final

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン　ＴＨＥ　ＦＩＮＡＬ

description.en:
Rising Sun - The Final is the 9th arc in the Captain Tsubasa series, covering the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain.

The arc lasting 10 chapters from April 2023 to April 2024 ended serialization half-way through the match when the mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, thus ending the official published serialization but continuing the story at his own pace, on the official Captain Tsubasa World website has a web-comic under the title Captain Tsubasa: Rising Sun - Finals.

altTitles.ja: れんげとなると！

description.en: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there...
description.ja: 近所の町中華が閉店して数カ月、久々に立ち寄るとそこはかつての看板のまま、ド派手な謎の店に変わっていた。中に入るとそこには1人のギャルがいて……。ギャルがもてなす町中華の物語だ。
description.pt-br: Já se passaram alguns meses desde o fechamento do restaurante chinês do bairro, e quando passei por lá pela primeira vez em um tempo, descobri que ele tinha se transformado em um restaurante chamativo e misterioso, mantendo ainda seu antigo letreiro. Ao entrar, deparei-me com uma garçonete... Esta é uma história sobre um restaurante em Chinatown onde as garçonetes são acolhedoras.

Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。
description.es-la:
¿Funciona la medicina moderna en otro mundo? Sin trampas ni equipos modernos. Un médico se enfrenta a un mundo dominado por la magia. El doctor Amami Yuito es transferido a un mundo diferente donde la magia médica está monopolizada. Slimes, quimeras, hombres bestia... Le sorprenden los habitantes con los que se encuentra por primera vez, pero con el poco equipo médico que tiene y sus propios conocimientos, es capaz de combatir enfermedades y heridas.
¿Podrá curar a los habitantes del otro mundo y salvar a los que sufren? Una fantasía de "Mundo diferente" x "médico" sin trampas ni equipos modernos, escrita por Tsuda Houkou que además es un médico en funciones e ilustrada por el prometedor Takishita Nobuhide!

altTitles.ja: 王宮のトリニティ

description.en: In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!

altTitles.ja: ダブルスーサイド

description.en:
Kei has been a vegetarian and tended to have an unbalanced diet since childhood. He and his much older brother Sai, who has a brother complex but who’s become reliable, get along well together.
For some reason, ever since he was a child, Kei has wanted to taste blood. Even though he knows it’s wrong, he can’t help thinking about it, so his university classmate, who cuts herself, agrees to share her blood with him. As soon as Kei discovers the taste of blood, he realizes he’s always wanted to eat Sai…

Can Kei become aware of his affection for Sai without confronting his desire to eat him?
Extra included for this story of twisted love!

altTitles.ja: クールな妻のさーちゃん

description.en: A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.
description.es: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.es-la: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica com dois amigos de infância que um dia vão se casar e o processo que leva até esse ponto.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Hunter là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy, từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến những cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Hunter với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi sắp 12 tuổi, Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào kỳ thi Hunter, ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapika, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một Hunter... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: The Frontier Alchemist ~ I Can't Go Back to That Job After You Made My Budget Zero

altTitles.ja: 辺境の錬金術師
辺境の錬金術師 ～今更予算ゼロの職場に戻るとかもう無理～

altTitles.ja-ro: Henkyou no Renkinjutsushi: Imasara Yosan Zero no Shokuba ni Modoru Toka Mou Muri

altTitles.zh-hk: 邊境的鍊金術師 ～現今要回到零預算的職場已經不行～

description.en:
Rust worked in the alchemist association. He specialized in basic research, but the current president, a former government official, failed to understand the importance of the basic research department and slashed its budget. To make matters worse, he was made to transmute basic materials for alchemists of other departments.

But one day, his budget for the next term was reduced to zero, and the president announced the basic research department was disbanded.

The same day, a friend from his academy days invited him to help develop her new dominion in the borderland, and Rust, seeing no future for himself in the association, decided to quit.

Rust was actually one of the greatest alchemists on the planet. The basic materials he transmuted were of the highest quality, and could not be acquired anywhere else. These high quality materials covered a lot of gaps in the association, and Rust’s departure made a big mess.

Feeling liberated after leaving the association, Rust worked in the borderland with a newfound enthusiasm and vigor.

altTitles.ja: シーイズビューティフル

description.en: In the mysterious institution of Familie, girls are raised in isolation. Kurumi, a resident child, falls asleep the day before her 10th birthday. When she next awakes, 14 years have passed. The curtain opens on this tale of misfortune, following Kurumi's journey in an unfamiliar place, surrounded by friends who have long since grown up, and ridden with missing memories.
description.es-la: En una institución misteriosa, Familie, crían chicas. Allí vivía Kurumi, el día anterior a su 10º cumpleaños, se fue a dormir. Y al despertar pasaron 14 años. Está en un lugar desconocido, sus amigas crecieron. Aquí comienza el viaje bizarro para descubrir sus memorias perdidas

description.en: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!

description.en:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)
description.fr:
Dans un monde fantasy où l'avenir de chacun est déterminé par les "skills" révélés durant l'enfance, la jeune Ivy se voit attribuer le métier de dresseuse de monstres au rang le plus bas qui soit : sans-étoile. Rejetée par son village, elle entame alors un voyage aux côtés de Sora, un slime tout faible, seul monstre qu'elle ait réussi à apprivoiser.
La plus faible des dresseuses et le plus faible des monstres parviendront-ils à survivre dans ce monde rude et sans pitié... ?
description.ja: スキル上主義の異世界。気弱で優しい魔物使い《テイマー》に転生した少女・アイビーは星なしの最弱ランクがために命を狙われ、生きるために旅に出る。道中唯一テイムできたのは最弱の崩れスライム「ソラ」最弱同士の２人（匹）には魔物がはびこる異世界は過酷……と思いきや＿＿？

description.en:
A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.
description.id: Seorang pria yang telah bereinkarnasi di dunia lain memperoleh panggilan "master tongkat" di dunia baru!  Namun, kemampuan itu tidak digunakan untuk mengalahkan musuh, atau untuk mendapatkan kekuatan, melainkan untuk ngentot dengan gadis-gadis cantik yang terus muncul!
description.ja: ノクターンノベルズ大人気作！ 異世界転生したとある男は新天地で「竿師」なる天職を手にする！ だが、その異能は敵を倒すためでもなく、権力を手にするためでもなく、ただひたすらに全力で次々と現れる美少女を抱くことに使うのだ！ 異色の異世界制覇譚、ここに開幕！

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

description.en: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!
description.ja:
「器用貧乏」は罪なのか！？
ソツなくガンバってきたのに戦力外通告！！

勇者パーティに所属しているオルンは、ある日突然
パーティリーダーから告げられる。

「実力不足だからパーティを抜けろ」

と。

さらに、他の仲間からは「器用貧乏」と罵られるオルン。
確かに、全てが平均的で突出した能力はない。
だが、ソツなく器用にこなしていたし、何より皆には
一番尽くしていたはずなのに…！？

失意のオルンは、ソロでの活動を開始する。
しかしその胸には、究極の「器用貧乏」ーー “万能者”になる野心が秘められていた。

بعد مذبحة الإمبراطور الغير عادلة لـعائلتها وموتها البائس، تستيقظ لارييت فيلوس لتجد أنها في جسد نفسها البالغة من العمر 12 عامًا، وضعتنصب عينيها فورًا على هدفٍ واحد: الأقتراب من الإمبراطور روبرت إدغار راسبي فيليلوم و أيضًا أنقاذ عائلتها، خطة لارييت مضمونة باستثناء أمرًاواحد... في جدولها الزمني الحالي، لا يزال الإمبراطور المستقبلي يتنكر كأميرة تدعى لافيرت! بحقيبة واحدة فقط وبعض العملات المعدنية في جيبها،تنطلق إلى العاصمة لتصبح أقرب و اكثر خادمة شرف محبوبة للأميرة، هل تستطيع لارييت إثبات قدرتها على الحفاظ على السر؟ والأهم من ذلك، هلستكون قادرة على الفوز بمحبة روبرت القاسي والسادي؟

description.de:
Nach dem ungerechten Massaker des Kaisers an ihrer Familie und ihrem eigenen elenden Tod wacht Laliette Bellua im Körper ihres zwölfjährigen Ichs auf. Sofort setzt sie sich ein einziges Ziel: Sich bei Kaiser Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum einschmeicheln und ihre Familie retten. Laliettes Plan ist kinderleicht, bis auf ein klitzekleines Detail ... In der gegenwärtigen Zeit gibt sich der zukünftige Kaiser noch als Prinzessin Rapertte aus! Mit nur einem einzigen Koffer und etwas Kleingeld macht sie sich auf den Weg in die Hauptstadt, um das liebste und vertrauteste Dienstmädchen der Prinzessin zu werden. Kann Laliette ihr Geschick, ein Geheimnis zu bewahren, beweisen? Und vor allem: Wird sie es schaffen, die Gunst der unbarmherzigen und sadistischen Rapertte zu erlangen?

---

description.en:
Following the emperor's unjust massacre of her family and her own miserable death, Laliette Bellua wakes up to find that she is in the body of her 12-year-old self. She immediately sets her sights on a single goal: suck up to Emperor Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum and save her family. Laliette's plan is foolproof, except for one tiny detail... In her present timeline, the future emperor is still masquerading as a princess named Rapertte! With only a single suitcase and some change in her pocket, she sets out for the capital to become the princess' closest and most beloved attendant. Can Laliette prove her ability to keep a secret? And more importantly, will she be able to win the favor of the cruel and sadistic Rapertte?

---
It was the end of a sunny summer day. In the hands of the tyrant, father, mother, brother and my neck went under the guillotine. And when I opened my eyes, it was my 12th birthday. Before the 13-year-old young Emperor became a brutal tyrant, I had to somehow become a god next to the man.

"I'm your maid of honor, so I'll follow you."

"I don't have much. And I don't own you."

To live and to save my family, I have to be in the eyes of that tyrant who didn't believe in humanity. Only then I can live. But that horrible monster is starting to change.

"I save what I lose in my hands. So don't hurt yourself without my permission."

---

description.fa:
پایان یک روز آفتابی تابستان بود. در دستان ستمگر ، پدر ، مادر ، برادر و گردن من زیر گیوتین رفت. و وقتی چشمانم را باز کردم ، تولد 12 سالگی من بود. قبل از اینکه امپراطور جوان 13 ساله به یک ستمگر بیرحم تبدیل شود ، من مجبور شدم به نوعی در کنار آن مرد باشم. "من کنیز افتخار تو هستم ، بنابراین تو را دنبال خواهم کرد." "من چیز زیادی ندارم. و مالک شما نیستم." برای زندگی و نجات خانواده ام ، باید در چشم آن ظالم باشم که به بشریت اعتقادی نداشت. فقط در این صورت است که می توانم زندگی کنم. اما آن هیولای وحشتناک در حال تغییر است. "من آنچه را که از دست می دهم ذخیره می کنم. بنابراین بدون اجازه من به خودت آسیب نرسان."

description.fr:
Après que l'Empereur a injustement massacré sa famille et qu'elle a perdu la vie, Laliette Bellua se réveille dans son corps d'enfant de douze ans. Aussitôt, elle ne se fixe qu'un objectif: obtenir les bonnes grâces de l'Empereur Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum et ainsi sauver sa famille. Le plan de Laliette est infaillible, à un détail près... À l'époque actuelle, le futur empereur se fait passer pour une princesse nommée Rapertte! Avec un seul bagage et un peu d'argent en poche, elle part pour la capitale afin de devenir la domestique préférée de la princesse. Laliette sera-t-elle en mesure de garder le secret? Et surtout, saura-t-elle gagner les faveurs de la cruelle et sadique Rapertte?

---

description.ko:
햇볕 강한 여름날의 죽음이었다.
열 여덟, 폭군의 손에 아버지와 어머니, 동생, 뒤이어 내 목까지 단두대 위에서 잘려나갔다.

그리고 나는 눈을 떴다.
열 두살의 생일이었다.

열 세살의 어린 황녀(?)가 잔인한 폭군 황제가 되기 전에 나는 어떻게든 저 인간 옆에 붙어 간신이 되어야 했다.

"저도 전하의 시녀니까 전하만을 따르겠어요."
"난 가진 게 별로 없어. 그리고 넌 내 것이 아니야."

살기 위해, 가족을 구하기 위해
인간 불신에 빠진 저 폭군의 눈에 들어야 해.

그래야만 내가 살 수 있어.

그런데 끔찍한 저 괴물이 점점 달라지기 시작한다.

"난 내 손에 쥔 것은 아껴. 그러니까 내 허락없이 네 몸에 상처 내지 마."

---

description.pt:
Por causa do testemunho de meu pai sobre o tirano, meu pescoço foi cortado com a família na guilhotina. Quando acordei eu estava em meu aniversário de doze anos novamente. Para salvar a família, decidi me tornar o segredo do tirano. Então, Vossa Majestade, vamos nos aproximar. Vou fazer o meu melhor com sinceridade, então não me mate de novo! “Porque estou realmente do lado de vossa Majestade? Eu juro!" "Cale-se." “Novamente, eu o amo. Não machuque seu corpo sem minha permissão.”

description.ru:
Я умерла в солнечный летний день. Мне было восемнадцать лет. Человек, чьи руки были по локоть в крови, казнил меня и всю мою семью. Я очнулась. Мне снова 12…
Время, когда юный принц ещё не стал жестоким императором-тираном. Мне нужно выжить, находясь рядом с ним. Я стану хитрей.
«Ваше Высочество, я ваша новая горничная, клянусь всегда следовать за вами.»
«Ты не моя вещь.»
Чтобы выжить и спасти свою семью, я должна суметь втереться в доверие к Императору, который утопает в недоверии к людям. Но этот ужасающий человек постепенно начал меняться?
«Я берегу то, что принадлежит мне, и поэтому без моего разрешения не смей вредить себе.»

---

description.vi:
Đó là sự kết thúc của một ngày hè đầy nắng. Dưới bàn tay của bạo chúa, cha, mẹ, anh trai và tôi đã phải chịu máy chém cổ. Và khi tôi mở mắt ra,thì lại là sinh nhật thứ 12 của tôi. Trước khi vị Hoàng đế trẻ 13 tuổi trở thành một bạo chúa tàn bạo, tôi phải nghĩ cách để trở thành một hầu cận bên cạnh người đàn ông đó. "Em là phù dâu của anh, nên anh sẽ phải đi theo em." "Ta không có thứ gì cho em cả.Và ta cũng không coi em là vật sở hữu." Để có thể sống sót và cứu lấy gia đình mình, tôi phải Luôn ở trong tầm mắt của tên bạo chúa không tin vào nhân loại kia. Chỉ khi đó tôi mới có thể sống. Nhưng con quái vật khủng khiếp đó đang bắt đầu thay đổi. "Ta sẽ dành lại những thứ mà ta đã mất trong tay.Vì vậy, xin đừng tự làm tổn thương mình khi chưa được phép của ta”

altTitles.ja: シャンピニオンの魔女

description.en: Luna, a black witch who lives quietly in a poisonous mushroom house, deep in the Black Forest. She lives in the city making high-efficiency medicine, but it is rumored that one will die if touched by her, and thus she is avoided… The life of a witch who doesn't know the warmth of people is carefully and momentarily drawn.

altTitles.ja: 宝石商のメイド

description.en:
The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where “a maid sells jewels”.

Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.

A tale spun by jewels and people.

With dainty illustrations, a jewel-bestowing short story series.
description.ja:
宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。
大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。
メイドが選んだ宝石を手にしたとき、彼ら自身の人生もまた輝きだす。
宝石と人が紡ぐ物語。
ーー繊細なイラストで贈る珠玉の連作短編。

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

altTitles.de: Meine falschen Freundinnen benutzen mich als Schutzschild

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

Science or magic?

 « Welcome to Paris, elected for the 68th month in a row as the least polluted city in the world. Thanks to cyanel, the air we breathe inside our houses is purified. » 

In a futuristic Paris, pollution is so prevalent that all greenery has disappeared. Recently, a gigantic plant appeared in the heart of the city, and the authorities are making sure no one gets close… Thomas, a young science student, is secretly studying the phenomenon, hoping for a better life.

Raised by his witchcraft-loving grand-mother, he is often prone to hallucinations. One day, he crosses paths with a strange young girl with very bright eyes, who faints in the air. From then on, his fate changes…
description.fr:
Science ou magie ?

« Bienvenue à Paris, élue pour le 68e mois consécutif : Ville la moins polluée du monde. C’est grâce au cyanel que nous pouvons respirer un air purifié à l’intérieur de nos maisons. »

Dans un Paris futuriste, la pollution est tellement présente que toute végétation a disparu. Depuis peu, une plante gigantesque a fait son apparition au cœur de la ville, et les autorités veillent à ce que la population ne s’en approche pas… Thomas, un jeune étudiant scientiste, se livre secrètement à l’étude de ce phénomène, peut-être un espoir pour une vie meilleure.

Élevé par sa grand-mère passionnée de sorcellerie, il est souvent victime d’hallucinations. Un jour, il croise une étrange jeune fille aux yeux très clairs qui s’évanouit dans les airs. Dès lors, son destin va basculer….

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

title.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady

altTitles.zh: 恶魔女仆只想被恶役千金欺负

altTitles.zh-ro: Èmó nǚpū zhǐ xiǎng bèi è yì qiānjīn qīfù

altTitles.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess

description.en:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

altTitles.ja: 冷たくて 柔らか

description.en: Takara Itosaki's boyfriend of two years, whom she had been thinking of marrying, suddenly dumps her. He states, "I'm not sure if you like me anymore because you don't get jealous." She has liked and cherished her past boyfriends in her own treasured way, but for some reason she is not always depressed when they break up. One day, a beautiful woman visited the real estate agency where she works. After talking with her for a while, she realizes that she is Ema, a classmate of hers, who transferred to another school in the second year of junior high school...

altTitles.ja: 三億円事件奇譚 モンタージ

description.en:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

altTitles.es-la: Humillando al jade y escogiendo a la perla

description.en:
When Ding Hanbai, the young master of the centuries-old jade-carving shop, first laid eyes on his timid shidi Ji Zhenzhu, he bullied him relentlessly, not expecting that Jiangnan could produce someone who would break down his defenses and melt his heart this way.   
They go from being unable to stand each other to admiring one another, but as the days pass, even this admiration begins to evolve…   
A step from brotherhood, a step to special affection, and one more step into a lifetime together.
description.es-la:
Cuando Ding Hanbai, el joven maestro de la tienda con cien años de antigüedad en la extracción de jade, puso sus ojos en su tímido shidi Ji Zhenzhu, él lo intimidó implacablemente, sin esperar que Jiangnan pudiera producir a alguien que derribara sus defensas y derritiera su corazón de esa manera.
Ellos pasaron, de no poder soportarse el uno al otro, a admirarse mutuamente, pero conforme los días iban pasando, incluso esa admiración fue evolucionando…
A un paso de la amistad, a un paso de un sentimiento especial, y un paso más hacia una vida juntos.
Nota: El título que escogimos para el manhua, se basó en uno de los varios significados de la palabra Crushing, y que se enfoca en la historia haciendo analogía en como "Ding que era un experto de tesoros, dejó de lado su pasión por estos y eligió su amor por Ji, su perla".

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

A Lolita-loving high school girl and the tragic Queen Marie-Antoinette in modern Japan. Born, raised and raised differently, the encounter between these two girls changes history.
description.ja: 悲劇の王妃マリー・アントワネットは処刑の瞬間。「誰も自分を知らない世界でやり直したい」と願った。その結果、若かりし少女の姿で現代日本に“転生”してしまったようで…？マリーが“転生”した先にいたのは、育ってきた環境から自己肯定感が低く、ロリータファッションを堂々と着こなせない自分を好きになれずにいる女子高生。時代も生まれ育ちも何もかも違う二人が現代日本で出会った時、ロリータファッションを通じて少女と歴史が変わっていく――

I, Leticia Violet, was devoted to my husband, but I lost everything. Just as she is about to lose her life, a man appears in her life. He promises to help me achieve the perfect revenge...

"When you say you'll help me get my revenge... please honor your word."

To those who brought me to my death, I will give back all that I have received.

---
When Letitia Winchester faces death at the hands of her husband’s mistress, fate intervenes. She’s fished out of the river by Prince Sion, the first “Sol” born in a holy empire in 300 years. Using his divine powers, he changes Letitia’s appearance and gives her the new identity of Countess Anarose Victoire. Armed with divine powers and a thirst for revenge, the two form an unlikely alliance. Prince Sion seeks justice for a fallen friend, while Letitia plots retribution against those who wronged her.

Together, they embark on a journey of vengeance and redemption.

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”
